eu_initiatives:
Internal Gas Market and Network Codes  
Energy Union
organisation_name: European Association for the Streamlining of Energy Exchange - gas (EASEE-gas)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The association's main purpose is to develop and promote common business practices (CBPs) to simplify and streamline the business processes between all the gas industry players, leading to a more efficient and effective European gas market.
relevant_communication: All info is available on https://easee-gas.eu/
legal_status: Not for profit trade association registered in France (loi 1901)
position: Board Member and Chair of the Executive Committee
